value:
$WmMPID_アスベル,ch07_12_Asbel_M_Normal,Face|I see... Askr has truly found itself
beset by difficulties.$k$p$WmMPID_ロナン,ch07_13_Ronan_M_Normal,Face|This may not be my world, but I can't
turn my back on those in need. Let
me help.$k$p$WmMPID_サラ,ch07_11_Sara_F_Normal,Face|At the very least, it seems that
I won't get bored.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, all! It's quite a relief to
know that you're willing to lend us
your strength.$k$p$WmMPID_ミランダ,ch07_14_Miranda_F_Normal,Face|If Prince Leif is offering his aid, how
can we refuse?$k$pAs the princess of Ulster, I vow to
do what I can to help you, Princess
Sharena.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ロナン,ch07_13_Ronan_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|So in this world...I am known as a
Hero.$k$p$WmMPID_アスベル,ch07_12_Asbel_M_Normal,Face|Hearing that always makes me a
little uncomfortable.$k$pHowever, I will do my utmost to
uphold the good name of Lord Ced
and the Magi.$k$p$WmMPID_ミランダ,ch07_14_Miranda_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_サラ,ch07_11_Sara_F_Normal,Face|Princess Miranda...what is it?$k$p$WmMPID_ミランダ,ch07_14_Miranda_F_Normal,Face|What? Oh...nothing. I was just
daydreaming.$k$p$WmMPID_サラ,ch07_11_Sara_F_Normal,Face|Within you...I can hear a tangle
of voices.$k$p$WmMPID_アスベル,ch07_12_Asbel_M_Normal,Face|Is there something causing you
distress?$k$p$WmMPID_ミランダ,ch07_14_Miranda_F_Normal,Face|Well...$k$pIn truth, when I was first summoned
here, I lost my composure... I looked
at $Nu and said...$k$p"State your name, you rude creature!"$k$p$WmMPID_サラ,ch07_11_Sara_F_Normal,Face|I suppose you were disoriented.
I've heard worse...$k$p$WmMPID_ミランダ,ch07_14_Miranda_F_Normal,Face|It was my arrogance as royalty that
is to blame.$k$p$WmMPID_ロナン,ch07_13_Ronan_M_Normal,Face|And you've been worrying about it
ever since.$k$p$WmMPID_ミランダ,ch07_14_Miranda_F_Normal,Face|In Askr...I have neither territory nor
subjects. I am merely a Hero.$k$pSara, Ronan, Asbel...$k$pHere, my responsibility is not to
my people as a princess. It is to
fulfill the duties of a Hero, like you.$k$pI will devote myself to that. I ask that
you put aside any misgivings and
treat me as an equal.$k$p$WmMPID_アスベル,ch07_12_Asbel_M_Normal,Face|If that is what you ask, Princess...
We will try.$k$p$WmMPID_サラ,ch07_11_Sara_F_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p
